Hello all,

I'm looking into doing some optimization of/sensitivity calcula=
tions regarding thermo-chemical parameters for an SOFC simulation.  It woul=
d be useful to be able to manipulate the kinetic and thermo parameters loca=
ted in the cti files from within the Matlab environment, rather than having=
 to create a new cti file each time the parameters are perturbed.

I'm fair=
ly certain that I can manipulate the kinetic parameters, to some degree, us=
ing the "setMultiplier" function, but that no such Matlab functions exist f=
or manipulating thermo parameters.

My questions are: 1) Are there function=
s written in the C++ code for changing the thermo coefficients on the fly, =
and 
2) If so, how difficult would it be to write Matlab wrapper code for t=
hese functions?

I looked back through some of the usergroup emails I've sa=
ved, and it looks like Dan Smyth was doing something similar, except with F=
ortran code...has anybody else had any luck with this type of thing?

Many =
thanks,
Steven C. DeCaluwe
University of Maryland
